A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars episode 8 is a good movie but not a great movie and leaves episode 9 with very little to look forward too. With Carrie Fishers passing Star Wars is now without all three of the stars who made the originals what they are. It seemed like the goal of episode 8 was to completely undo what the Force Awakens built and that's the trouble you run into without someone planning all three episodes out as a single story.
